text: @realDonaldTrump So your rally attendees will be getting the Coronavirus? Intelligent leaders of other countries are already cancelling crowd events. Of course your rally crowds are so small, probably no need for alarm. #TrumpFlu #TrumpDowCrash2020 #ScienceDenierPrez https://t.co/CWen2Hw3HX

entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.
